biotools.summary:
A tool for creating GROMACS virtual sites parameters to increase performance in all-atom molecular dynamics simulations.

Derives Gromacs virtual site parameters (angle constraint, dummy constraints) for an itp/rtp file based on force field data.

bioschemas.name: MkVsites
bioschemas.summary:
A tool for creating GROMACS virtual sites parameters to increase performance in all-atom molecular dynamics simulations.

Derives Gromacs virtual site parameters (angle constraint, dummy constraints) for an itp/rtp file based on force field data.
